org.smscom.prime.core.comm
Interface ICommGateway

All Known Implementing Classes:
PastryGateway
public interface ICommGateway

This interface defines the set of communication capabilities provided by the PRIME framework

Author:
Mauro Caporuscio

Method Summary
 IReceiver getReceiver()
          return a Receiver object needed for receiving messages from the underlying layer
 void lookup(CURI source, AURI aURI)
          Looks up for a resource of interest

          PRIME implements the Publish/Subscribe communication paradigm.
 void query(CURI curi, java.lang.String query)
          Looks up for resources of interest matching the given SPARQL query
 void register(CURI curi)
          Registers a given CURI within the underlying layer.

          Replies to a received message

          Sends a given message m to a specific destination
 void sendToNeighbors(CURI source, PrimeProtocol type, java.io.Serializable m)
          Send a given message m to the set of Neighbors (the definition of "Neighborhoods" depends on the specific underlying Peer-to-peer system).

          PRIME implements the Publish/Subscribe communication paradigm.
 

Method Detail

publish

void publish(CURI source,
             URI topic,
             java.io.Serializable msg)
PRIME implements the Publish/Subscribe communication paradigm. Specifically, this method publishes a given message to a specific topic

Parameters:
source - the CURI of the source node
topic - the topic of the message. Note that a topic is identified by a URI.
msg - the message to be published

subscribe

void subscribe(URI topic)
PRIME implements the Publish/Subscribe communication paradigm. Specifically, this method subscribes the current node for a topic of interest

Parameters:
topic - the subject of interest

register

void register(CURI curi)
Registers a given CURI within the underlying layer.

Parameters:
curi - the of the new resource

getReceiver

IReceiver getReceiver()
return a Receiver object needed for receiving messages from the underlying layer

Returns:
The @Receiver

send

void send(CURI source,
          CURI dest,
          PrimeProtocol type,
          java.io.Serializable m)
Sends a given message m to a specific destination

Parameters:
source - The source node
dest - The destination node
type - The message type
m - The message

sendToNeighbors

void sendToNeighbors(CURI source,
                     PrimeProtocol type,
                     java.io.Serializable m)
Send a given message m to the set of Neighbors (the definition of "Neighborhoods" depends on the specific underlying Peer-to-peer system).

Parameters:
source - The source node
type - The message type
m - The message

replyTo

void replyTo(PrimeMessage from,
             CURI source,
             PrimeProtocol type,
             java.io.Serializable m)
Replies to a received message

Parameters:
from - The PrimePacket to reply
source - The source node
type - The message type
m - The message

lookup

void lookup(CURI source,
            AURI aURI)
Looks up for a resource of interest

Parameters:
source - The source node
aURI - The AURI of interest

query

void query(CURI curi,
           java.lang.String query)
Looks up for resources of interest matching the given SPARQL query

Parameters:
curi - the CURI identifier of the resource issuing the query
query - SPARQL query
